8d23d481-21d2-47d6-9187-28717c213cab: Spending a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, you can imbue your weapons with a fraction of your power. For 1 round, your weapons deal +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and are treated as magic for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. For every five {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} you possess, this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} increases by +1, to a maximum of +5 at 20th level.
